SEARCH
Package mvcpack

Class Model

java.lang.Object
mvcpack.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model class is responsible for managing the overall operations involving hotels, rooms, and reservations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    utility

    Constructs a Driver instance and initializes the necessary objects.

  • Method Details

    • addHotel

      public int addHotel(String name, int standardRoomCount, int deluxeRoomCount, int execRoomCount)
      The addHotel() method adds a new hotel to the Model with the specified name and room counts.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel to be added.
      standardRoomCount - The number of standard rooms to be added to the hotel.
      deluxeRoomCount - The number of deluxe rooms to be added to the hotel.
      execRoomCount - The number of executive rooms to be added to the hotel.
      Returns:
      An integer value indicating the status of the addition operation. Returns 1 if the hotel was added successfully, -1 if the total room count is 0 or less, and -2 if the total room count exceeds 50.

    • openHotel

      public String[] openHotel(int hotelIndex)
      The openHotel() method opens the hotel at the specified index and returns the hotel details.
      Parameters:
      hotelIndex - The index of the hotel to open.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the hotel details.

    • renameHotel

      public boolean renameHotel(String newName)
      The renameHotel() method renames the hotel at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      newName - The new name of the hotel.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the status of the renaming operation. Returns true if the hotel was renamed successfully, and false if the hotel name already exists.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(int roomType, int hotelIndex)
      The addRoom() method adds a room to the hotel at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      roomType - The type of room to add.
      hotelIndex - The index of the hotel to add the room to.

    • setResTotalPrice

      public void setResTotalPrice(int promoValidity, int checkIn, int checkOut, int roomIndex)
      The setResTotalPrice() method sets the total price of a reservation based on the check-in and check-out dates.
      Parameters:
      promoValidity - The validity period of the promotion.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      roomIndex - The index of the room to set the total price for.

    • removeRoom

      public String removeRoom(int index)
      The removeRoom() method removes a room from the hotel at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the room to remove.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the removal operation.

    • updatePrice

      public String updatePrice(double price)
      The updatePrice() method updates the base price of the hotel.
      Parameters:
      price - The new price to set.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the update operation.

    • updateDatePrice

      public String updateDatePrice(int date, double multiplier)
      The updateDatePrice() method updates the price modifier for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to update the price for.
      multiplier - The new price modifier.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the update operation.

    • removeReservation

      public String removeReservation(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The removeReservation() method removes a reservation from the hotel at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The index of the room to remove the reservation from.
      resIndex - The index of the reservation to remove.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the removal operation.

    • removeHotel

      public void removeHotel()
      The removeHotel() method removes the hotel at the specified index.

    • addReservation

      public String addReservation(String name, int checkIn, int checkOut, int roomIndex, String[] breakdown)
      The addReservation() method adds a reservation to the hotel at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the guest making the reservation.
      checkIn - The check-in date of the reservation.
      checkOut - The check-out date of the reservation.
      roomIndex - The index of the room to reserve.
      breakdown - The breakdown of the reservation.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the addition operation.

    • getHotelListNames

      public String[] getHotelListNames()
      The getHotelListNames() method returns the names of all hotels in the hotelList.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the names of all hotels in the hotelList.

    • getRoomListNames

      public String[] getRoomListNames()
      The getRoomListNames() method returns the names of all rooms in the hotel at the selected index.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the names of all rooms in the hotel at the selected index.

    • checkValidReservation

      public int checkValidReservation(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The checkValidReservation() method checks the validity of the room and reservation indices.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The index of the room to check.
      resIndex - The index of the reservation to check.
      Returns:
      An integer value indicating the status of the check. Returns 0 if the room and reservation indices are valid. 1 if the reservation index is invalid. 2 if the room index is invalid.

    • getResBreakdown

      public String[] getResBreakdown(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The getResBreakdown() method returns the breakdown of the reservation at the specified room and reservation indices.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The index of the room to get the reservation breakdown from.
      resIndex - The index of the reservation to get the breakdown from.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the breakdown of the reservation.

    • printReservationInfo

      public String[] printReservationInfo(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The printReservationInfo() method returns the information of the reservation at the specified room and reservation indices.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The index of the room to get the reservation information from.
      resIndex - The index of the reservation to get the information from.
      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the information of the reservation.

      Returns:
      An array of strings containing the available rooms.

    • getAvailableRoom

      public String getAvailableRoom(int checkIn, int checkOut, int type)
      The method getAvailableRoom() iterates through a list of rooms to find an available room for a given check-in and check-out date range.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - The checkIn parameter represents the check-in date for a room reservation.
      checkOut - The checkOut parameter represents the check-out date for a room reservation.
      type - The type parameter represents the wanted type of room
      Returns:
      The method getAvailableRoom returns the index of the first available room in the roomList that is available for the specified check-in and check-out dates. If no available room is found, it returns -1.

    • serializeHotelList

      public String serializeHotelList(String name)
      The serializeHotelList() method serializes the hotelList and saves it to a file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the file to save the serialized data to.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the serialization operation.

    • deserializeHotelList

      public String deserializeHotelList(String name)
      The deserializeHotelList() method deserializes the hotelList from a file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the file to load the serialized data from.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the deserialization operation.

    • loadManager

      public boolean loadManager(String userName, String password)
      The loadManager() method loads a manager from the managerList.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the manager to load.
      password - The password of the manager to load.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the status of the load operation. Returns true if the manager was loaded successfully, and false if the manager was not found.

    • deleteManager

      public boolean deleteManager()
      The deleteManager() method deletes the current manager from the managerList.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the status of the deletion operation. Returns true if the manager was deleted successfully, and false otherwise.

    • getManagerPresence

      public boolean getManagerPresence()
      The getManagerPresence() method checks if a manager is currently logged in.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the presence of a manager. Returns true if a manager is logged in, and false otherwise.

    • logoutManager

      public void logoutManager()
      The logoutManager() method logs out the current manager.
